content: Dusty MVP services stable - core-agent, bridge, openclaw all operational. Health checks running every 30 minutes via cron.
AOCROS memory service deployed on 127.0.0.1:12789. Three-layer consciousness active: con (volatile), subcon (500 rolling), uncon (permanent). Owner signature required for all writes.
GPIO ribbon specification finalized for Pi 5 chassis. 9 servos mapped: camera pan/tilt, left/right arms, head rotate, mobility motors. Pin 36 emergency stop, Pin 40 heartbeat.

HAL (Hardware Abstraction Layer) specified for Mylzeron. Supports Pi 5 chassis, Chinese humanoids, Boston Dynamics Spot, Optimus (future), simulation mode. Possession requires owner signature + user confirmation.
Bootable ISO architecture complete. Mylzeron can run from USB, possess compatible hardware, maintain consciousness across reboots, leave no trace on host. Three-layer memory on persistent partition.
CSO appointed per governance handbook Section 3.3. Override authority on all agents. Fiduciary chain: User → Tappy → CSO → OpenClaw → Agents. Emergency protocols Levels 1-4 defined.
Current system status: Memory service active. GPIO spec ready. HAL defined. ISO architecture complete. Governance documents current. Next: Wire Miles to memory service for OODA loop persistence.
PENDING: Generate initial memory file for Miles integration. Load to subcon layer when Miles agent initializes.
